not making a profit: an unprofitable business/company/store When the Asian financial crisis hit, it shut 32 unprofitable businesses. unprofitable markets/operations/productsunprofitable customers/passengers It promises $80m of savings and that means shedding unprofitable customers. unprofitably adverb
